title: Betim Berisha (BBI Autosport, Pikes Peak)
description:
Betim Berisha is the co-founder of BBI Autosport, a shop that builds seriously fast Porsches for the street or the track. He just got back from Pikes Peak where he was the crew chief for David Donahue and  his crazy fast Porsche GT2 CS. We talk about the challenges of tuning for Pikes Peak, roads that change shape, aero, power, suspension magic, and a lot more. If you want to know what goes into making a car handle well, this is a must-listen. 

 

https://www.bbiautosport.com

@bbiautosport 

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman

Watch the show!: https://youtu.be/diczy6TZoOM
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
